091EA8DD.Line13.6D03F: Elias preached of saving the world while standing atop a mountain of corpses.

27FCB7D0.Line7.6D03F: That was what I witnessed in the Wanderer’s deeds.

5A1F4B4A.Line1.6D03F: The Prime Evils were reforming. Hell was coming. But Elias was not the answer to anyone’s prayers.

6F2A2F5B.Line11.6D03F: If you want to take the measure of someone, you judge them by their deeds, not their words. Simple as that.

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: Tainted by Lilith’s blood, and yet able to resist her corruption.

C1F13152.Line9.6D03F: And that was when I started to think that perhaps together, we could keep the evil at bay.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: Then there was the Wanderer. Everything Elias was not.
